languages.text: "Тебя обуревает скверна. С каждым твоим решением я все больше чувствую, что мне не место в твоей свите. Остановись. Покайся перед Императором, пока не поздно".
"You are consumed by corruption. With every decision you make, I feel more and more that I do not belong in your retinue. Stop. Repent before the Emperor — before it is too late."
languages.original_text: "Тебя обуревает скверна. С каждым твоим решением я все больше чувствую, что мне не место в твоей свите. Остановись. Покайся перед Императором, пока не поздно".

traits.locale_text: "You are consumed by corruption. With each new decision you make, I feel ever stronger that I do not belong on your retinue. Stop. Repent before the Emperor before it is too late."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are consumed by corruption. With every decision you make, I feel more and more that I do not belong in your retinue. Stop. Repent before the Emperor — before it is too late."

languages.text: «Está {mf|consumido|consumida} por la corrupción. Con cada decisión que toma, me siento menos cómoda en su séquito. Pare ya. Arrepiéntase ante el Emperador... antes de que sea demasiado tarde».
languages.original_text: "You are consumed by corruption. With every decision you make, I feel more and more that I do not belong in your retinue. Stop. Repent before the Emperor — before it is too late."

traits.locale_text: «Está {mf|consumido|consumida} por la corrupción. Con cada decisión que toma, me siento menos cómoda en su séquito. Pare ya. Arrepiéntase ante el Emperador antes de que sea demasiado tarde».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “你已经被腐化吞噬了。你每做一个决定，我都会坐立不安，感觉自己不该再跟在你身边了。快住手吧，趁现在还来得及，在帝皇面前忏悔吧。”
languages.original_text: "You are consumed by corruption. With every decision you make, I feel more and more that I do not belong in your retinue. Stop. Repent before the Emperor — before it is too late."

traits.locale_text: “你已经被腐化吞噬了。你每做一个决定，我都会坐立不安，感觉自己不该再跟在你身边了。快住手吧，趁现在还来得及，在帝皇面前忏悔吧。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous êtes totalement {mf|corrompu|corrompue}. À chaque décision que vous prenez, je sens de plus en plus que je n'ai rien à faire à vos côtés. Ça suffit. Repentez-vous devant l'Empereur... avant qu'il ne soit trop tard. »
languages.original_text: "You are consumed by corruption. With every decision you make, I feel more and more that I do not belong in your retinue. Stop. Repent before the Emperor — before it is too late."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes totalement {mf|corrompu|corrompue}. À chaque décision que vous prenez, je sens de plus en plus que je n'ai rien à faire à vos côtés. Ça suffit. Repentez-vous devant l'empereur avant qu'il ne soit trop tard. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたは腐敗に蝕まれている。あなたが決断を下すたびに、私はあなたの従者ではいられないと感じつつある。止まれ。手遅れになる前に、皇帝の前で悔い改めるのだ」
languages.original_text: "You are consumed by corruption. With every decision you make, I feel more and more that I do not belong in your retinue. Stop. Repent before the Emperor — before it is too late."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは腐敗に蝕まれている。あなたが決断を下すたびに、私はあなたの従者ではいられないと感じつつある。止まれ。手遅れになる前に、皇帝の前で悔い改めるのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Verderbnis verschlingt Euch. Mit jeder Eurer Entscheidungen fühle ich mehr und mehr, dass ich nicht in Euer Gefolge gehöre. Hört auf. Tut Buße vor dem Imperator, ehe es zu spät ist."
languages.original_text: "You are consumed by corruption. With every decision you make, I feel more and more that I do not belong in your retinue. Stop. Repent before the Emperor — before it is too late."

traits.locale_text: "Die Verderbnis verschlingt Euch. Mit jeder Eurer Entscheidungen fühle ich mehr und mehr, dass ich nicht in Euer Gefolge gehöre. Hört auf. Tut Buße vor dem Imperator, ehe es zu spät ist."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Yozlaşma seni tüketmiş. Verdiğin her kararla maiyetine ait olmadığımı daha güçlü bir şekilde hissediyorum. Dur artık. Çok geç olmadan İmparator'un huzurunda tövbe et."
languages.original_text: "You are consumed by corruption. With every decision you make, I feel more and more that I do not belong in your retinue. Stop. Repent before the Emperor — before it is too late."

traits.locale_text: "Yozlaşma seni tüketmiş. Verdiğin her kararla maiyetine ait olmadığımı daha güçlü bir şekilde hissediyorum. Dur artık. Çok geç olmadan İmparator'un önünde tövbe et."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
